com.isoterik.mgdx.audio

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.audio.AudioManager

  • public final class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton for managing game Sounds and Musics

    • Method Detail

      • __init

        public static void __init()
        Initializes the manager. This method is called internally by MinGdx and should never be called directly!

      • instance

        public static AudioManager instance()
        Returns:
        a shared instance

      • setSoundEnabled

        public void setSoundEnabled(boolean soundEnabled)
        Enables sound playback. Note: this only has effect on subsequent sounds that will be played, it doesn't affect sounds that are already playing
        Parameters:
        soundEnabled - sound playback is enabled if true, disabled otherwise

      • isSoundEnabled

        public boolean isSoundEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if sound playback is enabled, false otherwise

      • setMusicEnabled

        public void setMusicEnabled(boolean musicEnabled)
        Enables music playback. Note: this only has effect on subsequent musics that will be played, it doesn't affect musics that are already playing
        Parameters:
        musicEnabled - music playback is enabled if true, disabled otherwise

      • isMusicEnabled

        public boolean isMusicEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if music playback is enabled, false otherwise

      • playSound

        public void playSound(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound sound,
                      float volume)
        Plays a given sound
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to play
        volume - the volume

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music music,
                      float volume,
                      boolean loop)
        Plays a given music
        Parameters:
        music - the music to play
        volume - the volume
        loop - if true, music will loop
